name: Friday Night Funkin' VS Cowan Short (Ludum Dare Prototype)
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' VS Cowan Short (Ludum Dare Prototype)
description:
welp fnf mods are cool now, why not make one?

So before i made Friday Night Funkin' VS Cowan Short, i wanted to make a test before i made the mod, so why not make a test using the ludum dare prototype of the game! (the first ever version of fnf) 

just to let yall know that this IS a reskin so there techincally wont be any new characters or any new shit so download at ur own risk kiddo!

Marker is not a character made for this, and other fnf mods, he is my oc character that i post animations on tiktok, (follow me on tiktok) https://www.tiktok.com/@_motion_animations_?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp... hope yall enjoy! 

-Marker Cowan :)
